comment._content: Nothing like a good Dodger game, and close to the action! Shortly after this photo binoculars were invented.

comment.author: 7735968@N08
comment._content: How many bases could someone like Lou Brock take on a pass ball???

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: A history of the park en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ebbets_Field Brooklyn beat the Yankees 3-2 in the bottom on the 9th This was the first park to have shared armrests, instead of 2 on each chair, thereby giving extra large seats. I love all the advertising signs, Fatima cigarettes, Ever-ready safety razor, Imperial Beer, Green River Whisky, Clysmic (king of table waters) ,"Bull Durham", Johnson Brother's Lumber..
